item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Crema Cafe (27 Brattle St, Mt. Auburn St, Cambridge). #
  • I'm at The Globe Corner Bookstore (90 Mt. Auburn St, btw JFK & Dunster, Cambridge). #
  • I'm at Russell House Tavern (14 JFK Street, at Brattle Street, Cambridge) w/ 3 others. #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1154 Boylston St, Hammond St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Sonoma #
  • Taking Mario & Cindy sailing. (@ Jamaica Pond) #
  • I'm at City Feed & Supply (672 Centre St, Seaverns Ave, Jamaica Plain) w/ 2 others. #
